Reviews.Title: More than satisfied
Reviews.Author: maurice levesque
Reviews.Content: the reason I needed the unit was to put the camera inside my 1/16th scale Sherman tank and the receiver connected to my tv set.So now I can put the tank outside and control it by sitting in front of my tv.Absolutaly fantastic reception and the range is at least 600 feet,I must tell you I live in a rural area,no houses,no buildings except my own.I will purchase an rc truck soon and I will bye another buy another Securityman kit to do the same thing as the tank.Thank you for inquiring about it.byeMaurice

ProductInfo.Features:
Do-it-yourself (D.I.Y) easy to setup and use digital wireless camera kit
Wireless transmission up to 200ft between walls and up to 350ft in clear line of sight
Built-in microphone for audible recording up to 20ft away
Digital wireless pairing between camera and receiver, worry free of signal interception by neighbors
Video signal loss alert notification
ProductInfo.Name: Securityman DigiminiAir Digital Wireless Mini Indoor Camera Kit with Audio (Black)
